metadata.title: CVE-2013-7374 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
The Ubuntu Date and Time Indicator (aka indicator-datetime) 13.10.0+13.10.xbefore 13.10.0+13.10.20131023.2-0ubuntu1.1 does not properly restrictaccess to Evolution, which allows local users to bypass the greeter screenrestrictions by clicking the date.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-7374` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gnome-control-center-datetime - 13.10.0+14.04.20131125-0ubuntu1
indicator-datetime - 13.10.0+14.04.20131125-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: indicator-datetime package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '13.10.0+14.04.20131125-0ubuntu1').
